General.Name: Heren Health Co Ltd
General.Description: Heren Health Co., Ltd. provides solutions and services for medical information, hospital scenario applications, and regional health information to hospitals, governments, and individuals in China. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
